repository.description: Repository to which the milestone belongs

url.description: API endpoint URL for the milestone

html_url.description: URL to view the milestone in a web browser

labels_url.description: URL to fetch labels associated with the milestone

node_id.description: Unique identifier for the milestone node

title.description: Title or name of the milestone

open_issues.description: Total number of open issues within the milestone

closed_issues.description: Total number of issues closed within the milestone

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the milestone was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the milestone was last updated

closed_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the milestone was closed

due_on.description: Timestamp indicating when the milestone is due
